issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
When I build a Geocoder sample I got this error: 

{code}/usr/local/lib/node_modules/titanium/node_modules/longjohn/dist/longjohn.js:181
        throw e;
              ^
TypeError: Object #<Object> has no method 'isFileWritable'

comments.body:
Can you attach your Studio diagnostic file? (Help -> Studio -> Run Diagnostic Test...)

That way we can be sure of all your versions.

Actually, I just noticed in your log that it's referencing 3.0.0.GA.

Please use 3.1.1 GA (make sure it's set in tiapp.xml) and try again.

Hi Daniel

Here you are:

So where is the Geocoder sample that you're using so that I can try myself?
Is the same I import on Dashboard Develop tab.
Hmm, so I tried to run the Geocoder sample from the Develop tab like you said, and it works fine for me with 3.1.1 GA...

Hi Daniel,

I did it:

sudo npm uninstall -g titanium
 
sudo rm -r ~/.titanium
 
rm /Users/<username>/Library/Application\ Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/3.1.1.GA
sudo npm install -g titanium
titanium sdk install --force --default
titanium sdk install --branch 3_1_1 --force --default

And now it runs OK

Thanks so much for your help
You're welcome, thanks for posting the solution. Closing as fixed.
